Hex signature: D0 CF 11 E0 A1 B1 1A E1
Description: Compound File Binary Format, a container format defined by Microsoft COM. It can contain the equivalent of files and directories. It is used by Windows Installer and for documents in older versions of Microsoft Office.[44] It can be used by other programs as well that rely on the COM and OLE API's. (0xD0CF11E0 visually resembles "DOCFILE".[45])
